declaration.author: XCOPYART
declaration.text: … so I'm going to go 'all in' and apply CC0 all my existing art ✨
declaration.scope: All existing and future solo non-collaborative works

supporting.note: Confirms XCOPY retroactively applied CC0 to all prior solo work in 2022
XCOPY cited as prominent CC0 adopter in NFT space

exclusions: Collaborative works are explicitly excluded from the CC0 declaration

risk_notes: XCOPY as an artist identity has brand recognition. Use visual primitives (glitch, decay, fragmentation) rather than 'XCOPY' as an in-world proper noun or attribution.
notes: Primary source is the August 1, 2022 tweet. Declaration is clear and unambiguous for solo works. High confidence — no governance ambiguity.
